code: import toast from"react-hot-toast";import{useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import routes_ from"../../constants/Route";import SessionService from"../../services/Session";import{SUCCESS,LOADING,ERROR}from"../notifications/Notification";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MakeForm(){var history=useHistory();var handleMakeFormSubmit=function handleMakeFormSubmit(event){event.preventDefault();var loadingToast=toast.loading("Making session...",LOADING);SessionService.makeSession().then(function(id){toast.dismiss(loadingToast);toast("Session created successfully!",SUCCESS);history.replace({pathname:routes_.game(id)});}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);toast.dismiss(loadingToast);toast("Failed to create session with error: ".concat(error.message),ERROR);}).finally(function(){toast.dismiss(loadingToast);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Make Session "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{className:"make-form",onSubmit:handleMakeFormSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Make"})})})]});}export default MakeForm;
